title: A Family Affair
itunes:title: A Family Affair
description:
From Two Guys Smoke Shops in Salem, NH, Nick  Perdomo Sr. is in town to share stories and give everyone the inside scoop on what's new with Perdomo Cigars.  And...

In the Second hour, Nick Jr makes his radio debut to talk about the growing up in the business and his plans to carry on the family legacy.
